content: knitted jumper with raglan for babies in drops sky the piece is worked top down with fox-pattern sizes 1 month 8 years drops design pattern no skip-001-by yarn group b **sizes** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 - 5/6 - 7/8 years size equivalent to child s height in cm 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 - 98/104 - 110/116 - 122/128 **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100 150-150-150-150 g colour 11 hazelnut 50-50-50 50-50-50-50 g colour 03 light beige a left-over of colour 05 black for the eyes **knitting gauge ** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm 60 cm or 80 cm for rib drops buttons cedar no 513 4 items in all sizes
